item.title: Tender Notice 1565 (Supply of Fermenter for the Department of Botany)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Sealed Tenders are invited from the firms / suppliers of repute, which are registered with Sales Tax and Income Tax Departments for the supply of Fermenter for the Department of Botany, GC University Faisalabad, to be delivered at Campus. Details about quantity and specifications may please be seen in Tender Documents. Tender documents can be [...]

The post Tender Notice 1565 (Supply of Fermenter for the Department of Botany) appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
Sealed Tenders are invited from the firms / suppliers of repute, which are registered with Sales Tax and Income Tax Departments for the supply of Fermenter for the Department of Botany, GC University Faisalabad, to be delivered at Campus. Details about quantity and specifications may please be seen in Tender Documents. Tender documents can be obtained from the office of the undersigned from 14-01-2014 to 03-02-2014 during working hours (Monday – Friday) on payment of Rs. 1000/- (Rs. One Thousand only). The tender must be submitted before 1200 hours on 03-02-2014 and will be opened on 07-02-2014 at 1000 hours on the same day in presence of the Vendors/ Firms or their representative who wish to attend. The bids shall accompany Bid Security in form of a CDR/Bank Draft in the name of Treasurer, GC University, Faisalabad, valuing equal to 2% of the Bid Price. Tender documents can also be downloaded from GCUF website (www.gcuf.edu.pk) and/or PPRA website (www.ppra.org.pk) and, in this case, tender fee will be attached with bid proposal in form of CDR / Bank Draft in the name of Treasurer, GCUF.

Download Tender Document Tender 1565

Dr. Tehreema Iftikhar
Department of Botany
GC University, Faisalabad

The post Tender Notice 1565 (Supply of Fermenter for the Department of Botany) appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

item.content:encoded:
PEEF Scholarship Disbursement 3rd Installment (September 2013-Febraury 2014) PEEF Master Level Scholarship Session 2012-14

The PEEF Scholarship holder students’ session 2012-14 under heading program are informed to collect their acknowledgement sheet and scholarship feedback form from Students’ Financial Aid Office. The acknowledgement sheet and theirs CNIC duly singed by the Chairperson of Department mentioned on it, should be submitted before 17-01-2014 for payment of their scholarship.
For further information contact Ms. Saima Parveen, Incharge, Students’ Financial Aid Office. Contact No. 041-9201301

item.title: Mehfil-e-Meelad for Females
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
شعبہ اسلامیہ و عربی گورنمنٹ کالج یو نیورسٹی کے زیرِ اہتمام تیسری سالانہ محفل میلادِ مصطفیﷺ برائے خواتین کا انعقاد کیا گیا۔اس مو قع پر خطاب کر تے ہو ئے ڈاکٹر ثریا ذاکر نے کہا کہ ایسی محا فل کا انعقاد دل و دماغ کی پا کیزگی کے لئے ضروری ہے۔ذکر مصطفےٰ کا ئنات کی [...]

The post Mehfil-e-Meelad for Females appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
شعبہ اسلامیہ و عربی گورنمنٹ کالج یو نیورسٹی کے زیرِ اہتمام تیسری سالانہ محفل میلادِ مصطفیﷺ برائے خواتین کا انعقاد کیا گیا۔اس مو قع پر خطاب کر تے ہو ئے ڈاکٹر ثریا ذاکر نے کہا کہ ایسی محا فل کا انعقاد دل و دماغ کی پا کیزگی کے لئے ضروری ہے۔ذکر مصطفےٰ کا ئنات کی بلند ترین حقیقت ہے اور اللہ تعا لیٰ تک رسائی کا ذریعہ ہے۔ نئی نسل کی تعلیم و تربیت کے ساتھ ساتھ اُن کی روحانی نگہداشت بھی ہو نی چا ہئے۔ڈاکٹر عمرانہ وسیم نے نعت کی تا ریخ اہمیت اور آداب پر روشنی ڈالی ۔ ترکی نژد سکالر عا ئشہ گل نے کہاکہ ایسی محا فل حب نبوی میں اضا فہ کا سبب ہے۔ ترکی اگرچہ سیکو لر ملک ہے لیکن عوام کے دل محبت رسول سے سرشار ہیں ۔ نبیرہ عندلیب گل ایم پی اے نے کہا کہ معا شرے سے انتشار اور تفرقے کے خا تمے کے لے اخلاق نبوی اور محا فل اہم کردار ادا کر سکتے ہیں ۔ ہما رے پیغمبر نے معا شرے سے بے اعتدالی دور کر نے کے لئے محبت اخوت، مسا وات اور ہمدردی کا پیغام دیا ہے۔ محفل میلاد میں جی سی یو اور جی سی یو برائے خوا تین مدینہ ٹا ؤن کی طا لبات بڑی تعداد میں شا مل ہو ئیں۔ تقریب میں طا لبات نے نعت خوا لی بھی کی۔

[Show as slideshow]

The post Mehfil-e-Meelad for Females appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

item.title: Inter Departmental Quiz Competitions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Beaconite Quiz society is going to organize inter departmental Quiz competition. The students are cordially invited to participate as per schedule given below. Time :  10:00 am 16 January, 2014 Venue : Faiz Ahmad Faiz Hall Mian Muhammad Yousaf Block The categories are as follows: Islamic Studies Geography Current affairs History of Pakistan (post partition) [...]

The post Inter Departmental Quiz Competitions appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
Beaconite Quiz society is going to organize inter departmental Quiz competition. The students are cordially invited to participate as per schedule given below.

Time :  10:00 am 16 January, 2014

Venue : Faiz Ahmad Faiz Hall Mian Muhammad Yousaf Block

The categories are as follows:

  • Islamic Studies
  • Geography
  • Current affairs
  • History of Pakistan (post partition)
  • Everyday science

Rules and regulations are as follows:

  • There must be only one team from each department.
  • Each team will consist of two members.
  • There must be three rounds.
  • Team round.
  • Individual round.
  • Final round.

Teams scoring maximum marks in first two rounds will qualify for final round.

  • Ten seconds to answer the each question.
  • Second guessing is not allowed.

Note: Prizes and certificates will be awarded to winners and participants

Dr. Nadeem Sohail
Director Students Affairs

For further information Contact

Rana Abdul Munim
President
0300-7720618

Mian Romeel Aslam
General Secretary
0322-6915203

Ihsan Naeem
Press Secretary
0333-6936349

The post Inter Departmental Quiz Competitions appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

item.title: Award of Govt. Merit Scholarship District Toba Tek Singh on Account of the Result of the Secondary School Certifcate / Intermediate / BA / B.Sc First Annual Examination 2013
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Applications for the award of Merit Scholarships are invited from the eligible students of district T.T.Singh (Boys & Girls), Who have passed as whole their S.S.C./Intermediate, B.A/B.Sc. 1st Annual Examination 2013 from the boards of Intermediate & Secondary Education, and joined next classes in GC University, Faisalabad in the same year. The detail of target [...]

The post Award of Govt. Merit Scholarship District Toba Tek Singh on Account of the Result of the Secondary School Certifcate / Intermediate / BA / B.Sc First Annual Examination 2013 appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
Applications for the award of Merit Scholarships are invited from the eligible students of district T.T.Singh (Boys & Girls), Who have passed as whole their S.S.C./Intermediate, B.A/B.Sc. 1st Annual Examination 2013 from the boards of Intermediate & Secondary Education, and joined next classes in GC University, Faisalabad in the same year. The detail of target marks is as under:

Sr Name of Examination Passed

Target Marks

1

 S.S.C  Examination 2013

875

4

 Intermediate Examination 2013

660

5

 B.A./B. Sc. Examination 2013

480

The Head of Departments are also requested to pay their personal attention to the following points:

  • Attested Copies of S.S.C. /Intermediate/Degree Examination certificate(s) must be attached with the form
  • Attested Copy of CNIC of the father/guardian must be attached.
  • Copy of semesters’ fee voucher
  • The Orphan Students will have to supply the Death Certificate of their father issued from the competent authority.
  • A pupil’s lawful and defacto guardian may sign income certificate only in case the father is died and certificate to this effect be furnished by the Head of institution.
  • The students who have passed their examination by-parts/ in second attempt or improving their division are not eligible.

Copy of this letter/Circular may also be pasted on the Notice Board for information of the Students.

* Applications may please be submitted to Students’ Financial Aid office on or before 08-01-2014

The application form is available at Main Jee Photostat near Main Gate no. 02 Chenab Chowk GC University and GCUF website

Download Form (Toba tak Singh)

The post Award of Govt. Merit Scholarship District Toba Tek Singh on Account of the Result of the Secondary School Certifcate / Intermediate / BA / B.Sc First Annual Examination 2013 appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

Applications for the award of Merit Scholarships are invited from the eligible students of district Okara (Boys & Girls), Who have passed as whole their S.S.C./Intermediate, B.A/B.Sc. 1st Annual Examination 2013 from the boards of Intermediate & Secondary Education Sahiwal, and has joined next classes in GC University, Faisalabad in the same year. Target Marks

Rural

The Head of Departments are also requested to pay their personal attention to the following points:

  • Attested Copies of S.S.C. /Intermediate/Degree Examination certificate(s) must be attached with the form
  • Attested Copy of CNIC of the father/guardian must be attached.
  • Copy of semesters’ fee voucher

  • A pupil’s lawful and defacto guardian may sign income certificate only in case the father is died and certificate to this effect be furnished by the Head of institution.

item.title: Various Teaching and Non-Teaching Positions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Applications are invited for the appointments in a well reputed public sector educational institution from qualified, competent, motivated, innovative, goal oriented & committed professionals (Pakistani Nationals) for the following positions. Teaching Positions 1. Professor (BPS-21) 19 Posts Applied Psychology (1 Post) Banking & Finance (1 Post) Business Administration (1 Post) Commerce (1 Post) Computer Science [...]

The post Various Teaching and Non-Teaching Positions appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
Applications are invited for the appointments in a well reputed public sector educational institution from qualified, competent, motivated, innovative, goal oriented & committed professionals (Pakistani Nationals) for the following positions.

Teaching Positions

1. Professor (BPS-21) 19 Posts

  • Applied Psychology (1 Post)
  • Banking & Finance (1 Post)
  • Business Administration (1 Post)
  • Commerce (1 Post)
  • Computer Science (1 Post)
  • Education (1 Post)
  • Geography (1 Post)
  • Home Economics (1 Post)
  • Industrial  Management (1 Post)
  • Law (1 Post)
  • Mass Communication (1 Post)
  • Mathematics (1 Post)
  • Pakistan Studies / History (1 Post)
  • Political Science (1 Post)
  • Public Administration (1 Post)
  • Software Engineering (1 Post)
  • Statistics (1 Post)
  • Telecom Engineering (1 Post)
  • Urdu (1 Post)

Age Limit: 35-55 Year

Minimum Qualification

Experience

Minimum Number of Publications

Ph.D. from an HEC recognized Institution in the relevant field.

15-years teaching/research experience in HEC recognized University or a post-graduate Institution or professional experience in the relevant field in a National or International organization.
OR
10-years post-Ph.D. teaching / research experience in a recognized University or a post-graduate Institution or professional experience in the relevant field in a National or International organization.

The applicant must have 15 research publications (with at least 5 publications in the last 5 years) in HEC recognized journals.

2. Associate Professor (BPS-20) 20 Posts

  • Arabic (1 Post)
  • Applied Psychology (1 Post)
  • Banking & Finance (1 Post)
  • Computer Science (1 Post)
  • Geography (1 Post)
  • Home Economics (1 Post)
  • Industrial Management (1 Post)
  • Islamic Studies (1 Post)
  • Law (1 Post)
  • Mass Communication (1 Post)
  • Pakistan Studies / History (1 Post)
  • Pharmacy (Pharmaceutical Chemistry & Pharmaceutics) (1 Post Each)
  • Political Science (1 Post)
  • Public Administration (1 Post)
  • Sociology (1 Post)
  • Software Engineering (1 Post)
  • Statistics (1 Post)
  • Telecom Engineering (1 Post)
  • Urdu (1 Post)

Age Limit: 35-50 Year

Minimum Qualification

Experience

Minimum Number of Publications

Ph.D. in the relevant field from an HEC recognized University/ Institution.

10-years teaching/research experience in an HEC recognized University or a post-graduate Institution or professional experience in the relevant field in a National or International organization.
OR
5-years post-Ph.D. teaching / research experience in an HEC recognized University or a post-graduate Institution or professional experience in the relevant field in a National or International organization.

The applicant must have 10 research publications (with at least 4 publications in the last 5 years) in the HEC recognized journals.

3. Associate Professor (TTS) 10 Posts

  • Arabic (1 Post)
  • Banking & Finance (1 Post)
  • Business Administration (1 Post)
  • English (1 Post)
  • Law (1 Post)
  • Pakistan Studies / History (1 Post)
  • Public Administration (1 Post)
  • Statistics (1 Post)
  • Telecom Engineering (2 Posts)

Eligibility Criteria: Age Limit: 35-50 Year

Consolidated Pay / month Rs. 156,000/- – Rs. 9,100/- – Rs. 292,500/-

Qualification & Experience: Ph.D./Relevant terminal qualification from a recognized and reputable Institution in the relevant field with either 6-years post-Ph.D./Relevant terminal degree or minimum of 4-years of post-PhD experience with at least 6 years of experience prior to the PhD. The experience to be counted is to be of teaching/research in a recognized University or a post-graduate Institution or professional experience in the relevant field in a National or International Organization.

Publication: 10 research publications (with at least 4 publications in the past 5 years) in Internationally Abstracted Journals, recognized for the purpose of appointment on Tenure Track by the Higher Education Commission.

4. Assistant Professor (TTS) 4 Posts

  • Applied Linguistics (1 Post)
  • Physiology (2 Posts)
  • Computer Science (1 Post)

Consolidated Pay / month Rs. 104,000/-– 211,250/-

Qualification & Experience

Ph.D./Relevant terminal qualification from a recognized institution and excellent written communication skills as well as excellent presentation skills. An Assistant Professor should be demonstrably competent in the subject matter area of courses taught and should have indicated a serious commitment to teaching, but it need not be expected that an extensive reputation in the field has been acquired. As the Assistant Professor continues in this rank an effort to increase knowledge and improve teaching ability should he demonstrated, and professional presentation should be made through papers to professional organizations, through publications, or through other creative work.

5. Lecturer (BPS-18) 4 Posts

  • Graphic Design (2 Posts)
  • Physiology (2 Posts)

Age Limit: 21-35 Year

Minimum Qualification

Experience

Minimum Number of Publications

First Class Master’s Degree under Annual System and CGPA 3.00/4.00 under Semester System
OR
equivalent degree awarded after 16 years of education in the relevant field with no 3rd Division in the academic career from an HEC recognized University / Institution.

Condition of no 3rd division shall not be applicable in the qualification of appointment as lecturer to the candidate holding a higher degree viz. M.Phil/Ph.D. or equivalent degree with not more than one 3rd division in entire academic career.

Furthermore, the candidate with 2nd Division in the Master’s Degree but holding higher degree i.e. M. Phil/ PhD or equivalent degree with 18 years of education could be Considered.

No experience required

Nil

Instructions:

  • The application from can be download from the link (Job Application Form)
  • Following amounts for the positions mentioned below should be deposited online Account No. 1297-4, Bank of the Punjab, GCU, Faisalabad Branch. Original receipt must be attached with the application form as proof of payment.

Sr. No.

BPS/TTS

Amount

1

BPS-01 to 05

Rs. 500/-

2

BPS-06 to 16

Rs. 1000/-

3

BPS-18

Rs. 2000/-

4

BPS-20 & 21

Rs. 3000/-

5

Assistant Professor (TTS)

Rs. 4000/-

6

Associate Professor (TTS)

Rs. 5000/-

Instructions

  1. The duly filled in application forms must be supported with attested copies of educational testimonials / certificates, I.D. Card, two recent photographs and updated Curriculum Vitae.
  2. The candidates from abroad may submit their applications on plain paper, accompanied by recent Curriculum Vitae along with attested copies of degrees / testimonials and experience certificates.
  3. Incomplete or the applications received after due date will not be entertained.
  4. The institution reserves the right:
  5. Not to fill any vacancy without assigning any reason thereof or consider a person for appointment in a lower cadre against the posts advertised.
  6. To increase or decrease the number of vacancies as per availability of funds
  7. The candidates already in Service must apply through proper channel by the due date.
  8. The prescribed applications forms in quadruplicate for Professor & Associate Professor and triplicate for Assistant Professor & Lecturer are required.
  9. Complete applications must reach to the PO Box No. 27, GPO, Faisalabad by mail not later than 15.1.2014

Note:

  • NTS Test will be conducted for the posts mentioned at Sr. No. 6 to 27. However, all the details shall be obtained from the NTS website www.nts.org.pk.
  • Only short listed candidates will be called for interview.
  • Preference will be given to highly qualified and skilled candidates.
  • The institution is not responsible if call letters are delayed or not received due to any lapse of Courier Agency/Post Office/Telephonic Message.
  • No TA/DA is admissible when called for interview.

Job Application Form

The post Various Teaching and Non-Teaching Positions appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

The Scholarship holder students for Killa Gift Fund Stipend 2012-13 under heading program are informed to collect their cheque and Renewal Form from Students’ Financial Aid Office. The Renewal Form and their CNIC duly singed by the Chairperson of Department mentioned on it, should be submitted before 10-01-2014 for payment of their scholarship. For further [...]

The post Disbursement of Cheques for Killa Gift Fund Stipend Year 2012-13 appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
The Scholarship holder students for Killa Gift Fund Stipend 2012-13 under heading program are informed to collect their cheque and Renewal Form from Students’ Financial Aid Office. The Renewal Form and their CNIC duly singed by the Chairperson of Department mentioned on it, should be submitted before 10-01-2014 for payment of their scholarship.
For further information contact Ms. Saima Parveen, Incharge, Students’ Financial Aid Office.

item.title: Seminar in Collaboration of UNDP, Jang Group of Publications, Garments Industry and GCUF
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
یو رپی یو نین سے جی ایس پلس سٹیٹس ملنا خوش آئندہ ہے۔ بہتر حکمت عملی کے ذریعے اس سے بھر پور فا ئدہ حاصل کیا جا سکتا ہے۔ انڈسٹری ، گورنمنٹ اور تھنک ٹینک مل کر ایکسپورٹ بہتر بنا سکتے ہیں ۔ گھر وں کے چو لہے صرف گیس سے نہیں بلکہ عام آدمی [...]

The post Seminar in Collaboration of UNDP, Jang Group of Publications, Garments Industry and GCUF appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
یو رپی یو نین سے جی ایس پلس سٹیٹس ملنا خوش آئندہ ہے۔ بہتر حکمت عملی کے ذریعے اس سے بھر پور فا ئدہ حاصل کیا جا سکتا ہے۔ انڈسٹری ، گورنمنٹ اور تھنک ٹینک مل کر ایکسپورٹ بہتر بنا سکتے ہیں ۔ گھر وں کے چو لہے صرف گیس سے نہیں بلکہ عام آدمی کی اکنامی بہتر ہو نے سے جلیں گے۔ ایکسپورٹ کی بہتری کا دار ومدار پرا ڈکٹ کی کوالٹی کے علاوہ دہشت گردی کے خا تمے پرہے۔ان خیا لات کا اظہار یو این ڈی پی ،جنگ گروپ آف پبلیکیشن، گا رنمنٹ انڈسٹری اور جی سی یو نیورسٹی کے اشتراک سے ہو نے والے ایک فورم میں مقررین نے کیا۔ جی سی یو نیورسٹی کے وائس چانسلر ڈاکٹر ذاکر حسین نے فورم سے افتتا حی خطاب میں کہا کہ ملکی ایکسپورٹ کا سب سے بڑا حصہ کا ٹن انڈسٹری اور اُسکی مضو عات سے وا بستہ ہے۔ جی ایس پی پلس سٹیٹس سے بھر پور فا ئدہ اُٹھانے کے لئے انڈسٹری، یو این ڈی حکو مت لو کل انتظامیہ اور عوام مل کر آگے بڑھیں تا کہ اس مدت میں ایکسپورٹ بہتر کر کے ملک کو مجمو عی ترقی کی راہ پر ڈالا جا سکے ۔ ملکی ایکسپورٹ کو بہتر بنانے کیلئے جی سی یونیورسٹی کے ما ہرین ہر سطح متحرک ہو چکے ہیں ۔ چےئر مین چناب گروپ میاں محمد لطیف نے کہا کہ پا کستان میں انڈسٹری خود رو پو دا ہے۔ ایکسپورٹ کو بہتر بنانے کے لئے صنعتکار نہ صرف اپنی پرا ڈکٹ کو بہتر بنائیں بلکہ بین الاقوامی قوانین ما حو لیات ، چائلڈ لیبر اور لیبر کی تنخواہوں کو بہتر بنانے کے لئے عملی اقدامات کریں گے تو ہی انٹرنیشنل ما رکیٹ کے خریدار آپکا مال خریدیں گے۔ گیس اور بجلی کے بحران کی مو جو دگی میں جی ایس پی پلس سے فا ئدہ نہیں اُٹھایا جا سکتا ۔ کمشنر فیصل آباد سردار اکرم جا وید نے کہا کہ پا کستان کی ترقی میں اہم کردار ادا کرے گا۔ اس سے فا ئدہ اُٹھانے کے لئے حکو مت پلان کر رہی ہے۔ اس پلا ننگ میں انڈسٹری کی بہتری اور عام آدمی کے مفا دات کو ملحوظ خاطر رکھا جا ئے گا ۔دہشت گردی ایکسپورٹ کی راہ میں رکاوٹ ہے۔ انتظامیہ کی کو شش ہے کہ ملک سے دہشت گردی کا خا تمہ ہو۔ افرادی قوت ہمارا اثا ثہ ہے ۔ نو جوان ہمارا بہترین ریسورس ہیں ۔وفاقی پارلیمانی سیکر ٹری طلحہ چو ہدری نے کہا کہ جی ایس پی پلس اسٹیٹس خوش آئندہ ہے۔ انٹرنیشنل ما رکیٹ میں آئی ٹی کے بعد گا رمنٹس کی ایکسپورٹ پر توجہ دیں۔ یو این ڈی پی کی ریسرچر ما ہا خان نے پاکستان میں انڈسٹری اور ایکسپورٹ کی مجمو عی صو رتحال کا جا ئزہ پیش کیا ۔

The post Seminar in Collaboration of UNDP, Jang Group of Publications, Garments Industry and GCUF appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.

item.title: Inauguration of Seminar Hall at Emerging Science Block
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
جی سی یو نیورسٹی فیصل آباد ترقی کی راہوں پر گا مزن ہے۔ ہائی ٹیک لیب کے لئے 80 کروڑ کاPC-1 منظور ہو چکا ہے۔ ان خیا لات کا اظہار وائس چا نسلر ڈاکٹر ذاکر حسین نے ایمر جنگ سائنس بلاک میں گراؤنڈ پر سیمینار ہال کی افتتاحی تقریب میں کیا۔ اُنہوں نے کہا کہ [...]

The post Inauguration of Seminar Hall at Emerging Science Block appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
item.content:encoded:
جی سی یو نیورسٹی فیصل آباد ترقی کی راہوں پر گا مزن ہے۔ ہائی ٹیک لیب کے لئے 80 کروڑ کاPC-1 منظور ہو چکا ہے۔ ان خیا لات کا اظہار وائس چا نسلر ڈاکٹر ذاکر حسین نے ایمر جنگ سائنس بلاک میں گراؤنڈ پر سیمینار ہال کی افتتاحی تقریب میں کیا۔ اُنہوں نے کہا کہ طلبہ کی تعداد میں اضا فہ انفرا سٹرکچر کی تکمیل ، طلبہ کے لئے وظائف یو نیورسٹی سے سیا ست کا خا تمہ ، پی ایچ ڈی پروگرا م ہو رہے ہیں۔ اب ضرورت اس امر کی ہے کہ اسا تذہ اپنا کردار ادا کریں ۔ اور طلبہ و طا لبات کی تعلیم و تربیت پر توجہ دیں تا کہ یو نیورسٹی کا اصل مقصد پورا ہو سکے۔ اس مو قع پر نو رین عزیز قریشی ڈین فیکلٹی آف سائنس اینڈ ٹیکنا لوجی ، ڈاکٹر طا ہر تو نسوی ،عبد القا در مشتاق چےئر مین اسٹیٹ کےئر اور ذیشان احمد خان نے تقریب سے خطاب کیا ۔ اس مو قع پر ایمر جنگ سا ئنس بلاک کا نام بدل کے ڈاکٹر ذاکر حسین بلاک رکھنے کی قرارداد بھی متفقہ طور پر منظور کی گئی ۔

 

 

The post Inauguration of Seminar Hall at Emerging Science Block appeared first on GC University Faisalabad.
